Package controller

This package contains the controller of the application.
It contains everything that is needed to run the application, the logic behind the program.
There are various classes that are called classNameManager.java, these classes have a specific task to do (e.g.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClockManager
    This class has just one task to do, updating the clock of the program.
    It extends TimerTask so that can be executed as a Timer Thread.
    Controller
    The controller implements all the logic behind this TimeTracker, from the event listener when a button is clicked, to the persistence of the data.
    DailyManager
    This class updates the Daily which is the little table that shows the tasks that are executed today.
    ReportGenerator
    This class is used to make a report, a report is a file with a list of tasks.
    The report is a text file with a ".dat" extension.
    TimerManager
    This class updates the timer that is used to count the time of a single task.

Package controller Description

This package contains the controller of the application.
It contains everything that is needed to run the application, the logic behind the program.
There are various classes that are called classNameManager.java, these classes have a specific task to do (e.g. the timerManager class just updates the UI timer).
Author:
Patrich Tivoli
